profiles.name: Enrique Montes
profiles.summary:
⚡ Seeking lightning-fast websites that enhance performance, attract users, and boost online revenue?

🔹 I build Next.js and Gatsby solutions that address your most significant web challenges.
🔹 With over 30 years in IT, plus 5 years of React mastery.
🔹 I deliver blazing-fast, SEO-focused experiences that elevate your online brand and visibility.
🔹 Harness SSR, SSG, and dynamic routing for speed, scalability, and user satisfaction.
🔹 Let me reduce load times, amplify conversions, and reinforce your online presence.

🚀 Ready to elevate your business with a future-proof solution built for success?

I’m 𝐄𝐧𝐫𝐢𝐪𝐮𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐬, a 𝐅𝐮𝐥𝐥-𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫 bringing over 30 years of IT expertise and 𝟓+ years of modern React experience. By leveraging Server-Side Rendering (SSR), Static Site Generation (SSG), and Headless CMS (Strapi, Contentful, Sanity), I craft 𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞, 𝐒𝐄𝐎-𝐟𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 websites that excel in speed and user engagement.

🔧 Here’s how I can help your business thrive:

-⚡ High-Performance Development: Crafting modern, scalable sites with Next.js or Gatsby.
- 📂 Headless CMS Integration: Connecting Strapi, Contentful, or Sanity for easy content management.
- 🎨 UI/UX Design: Building engaging interfaces with Tailwind CSS, Styled-Components, and responsive layouts.
- 🔗 API-Driven Architectures: Utilizing REST or GraphQL for robust, data-centric applications.

📩 Let’s collaborate and create a lightning-fast, scalable web solution tailored to your goals. Message me on Upwork now, and we’ll turn your vision into a high-performance reality. 🚀

🌟 Core Skills:

✅ Front-End Development:
- JavaScript (ES7+, Babel)
- React.js
- Next.js (App Router, Static/Server-Side Rendering)
- Gatsby.js (Static Site Generation)
- HTML5, CSS3, SCSS
- Tailwind CSS, Styled-components
- UI Frameworks: Material UI, Bootstrap, Reactstrap

✅ Backend & API Development:
- RESTful APIs & GraphQL
- Node.js, Express.js
- Headless CMS integration: Strapi, Contentful, WordPress
- Apigility, Laminas from Zend

✅ CMS & Headless Solutions:
- WordPress (Gatsby or Next.js Sourcing WordPress)
- Strapi (Preferred for Headless CMS)
- Sanity, Contentful, Prismic

✅ Hosting & Deployment:
- Vercel, Netlify, AWS, Digital Ocean
- Serverless Deployments
- CI/CD Pipelines

✅ Search & Optimization:
- Typesense, Algolia
- SEO Optimization for Static Sites
- Lighthouse Performance Tuning

✅ Development Tools & Workflows:
- Git/GitHub, CI/CD
- Visual Studio Code, Docker

🎯 Experience:
With extensive experience developing full-stack applications for diverse clients, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions built on Next.js and Gatsby.js. From building blazing-fast static sites to crafting dynamic, API-driven web apps, I ensure that every project is optimized for performance and scalability.

🤝 Why Work with Me?

✨ Focused Expertise: Specialized in Next.js and Gatsby, ensuring I provide tailored solutions with the most advanced features.
✨ Reliable & Transparent: I prioritize clear communication and deliver regular updates, ensuring transparency throughout the development process.
✨ Performance-Driven: I implement best practices to achieve high-performance, SEO-friendly web applications that exceed client expectations.
